meaningMnemonic: If you have <kanji>comprehension</kanji>, then you are probably going <vocabulary>to realize</vocabulary> something about something else. Comprehension leads to realization, after all.
readingMnemonic: You realized something so amazing that you couldn't believe it. That comprehension, wow! The realization was so big that you <reading>sat</reading> (さと) down in disbelief. If you didn't you would have fallen on the ground.
